name: Sisters and Misters Footy 7v7 Tournament Team Booking
description:
Ladiessss and Gental Men!!! 
The  Sisters and Misters Footy Tournament is back and we couldn't be more excited about it!! 
A recreational tournament is open to all members of our community! 
Tournament Details: 
Day and Date - 26th October, Saturday 
Venue - Rush Arena  
Reporting time - 8:15 AM  
This is an team Sign up. 
Minimum 3 girls has to be an active for the game time  
Match details: 
Format : 8 min Halves + 2 minutes break 
Each team : 7 + 2 Sub 
League cum Knockout 
Read further for the FAQs of the tournament : 
Q1. What time will it end? 
11:30 AM is the Finals, followed by the Prize Distribution. 
Q2. What are the rules of the game? • 
7v7 • Rolling substitutions, with no limit to number of substitutions in a match • 8 minutes per half •  
More details on the rules of the game will be shared soon. 
Q3. Will we get breaks in-between the matches? 
Yes. You will be given a short break between matches to catch your breath and a snack. 
Q4. Will refreshments/food be provided? 
Water will be available for all players. Request everyone to carry their own bottle of water to refill. However, feel free to carry a snack and beverage from home if you like. 
There will be goodies at the venue as well 
Q5. Who is eligible to participate? 
Anyone is eligible to participate. 
Q6. What if I haven’t ever played Football before? 
The level of this tournament is beginner to intermediate. We would recommend some very basic prior experience, at our SIS footy sessions, or elsewhere, at the very least. 
Q7. Do I register as an individual player? 
Yes. You need to  register on a different link on our website  
Q8. Do I need any special equipment/attire? 
We recommend the usual football attire for a safer and better playing experience i.e. jersey/sports top, shorts, football shoes 
Q9. Will there be a changing room and washroom there? 
Yes. 
Q10. Can I bring my family and friends to watch? 
Absolutely! We encourage it! :) 
Q11. How will the teams receive any further communication, such as team colour, match schedule etc? 
Once the teams are formed, Captains from each team will be our main point of contact for any further communication to the teams. The Captains will be responsible for creating their team’s whatsapp group and relaying all necessary information to their teams. 
Hope that answers most of your questions . For any further information, please feel free to reach out :) 
We can't wait for you to experience this!! Let's kick this year off on a high! 
For support contact : Aishwarya Bharathi ( 9738012622)

location.name: RUSH Arena Jaibharath Nagar

name: Pole Workshop with Azdah
description:
Looking for a fun way to boost your fitness and confidence? Join us for a 90-minute pole workshop! This class is perfect for everyone, whether you're a complete beginner or looking to build on your skills. Azdah, our incredible instructor will be there to support you every step of the way, helping you learn new moves and have a great time. It’s all about discovering your strength, feminity and expressing yourself in a welcoming environment.  
Date: 26th October 2024, Saturday 
Time: 3 - 4.30 pm (Please arrive at the studio by 2.45 pm) 
Venue: Azdah, Indiranagar 
*Be sure to bring a water bottle to stay hydrated! 
Contact Saachi (9513334690) for more info

name: SIS Basketball Tournament - (Sisters and Misters) - Team Registration
description:
Hey Everyone! We are super excited to bring you a Sisters and Misters BBall tournament! 
 
Format - 3v3 half court basketball League cum Knockout format 
Number of players per team -  6  ( 3+3 Substitutes ) 
Level - Intermediate - Please note the teams should have 2 women playing at all times 
 
Who qualifies as an intermediate player? - If you have attended a couple of intermediate sessions with us. 
Have prior playing experience and have a good grasp of the basics of the sport.  
 
Things to carry : - Comfortable shoes (basketball shoes are not compulsory but we recommend them for better protection of ankles) - Jersey in the colour allocated per team - Water bottle - Small snack - Loads and loads of energy!\ 
 
Please note that once the teams are made, a captain will be assigned per team and added to a whatsapp group with the organisers for ease of communication 
Please feel free to reach out for any further queries! 
Aishwarya (Head of Bangalore Operations) 
Phone number: +91 9738012622 
WE CANNOT WAIT!! SIGN UP AND WE'LL SEE YOU THERE !!

name: Footy with the Sisters - Wednesday - HSR
description:
FOOTY WITH THE SISTERS 
We're coming to your locality at HSR !! Bring out those football boots or shoes and remember to clean 'em nice! We're getting on the field to play the Beautiful game! 
These sessions are open to all women! The football drills will be designed to both have fun and at the same time, learn and build on your basics of the sport! 
Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, football drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) 
Don't miss this!! See you on the field Sisters!! 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: B'Ball with the Sisters - Beginners and Intermediate
description:
Hey Ladies! Get ready to play some BBall with us! 
 
Location : St. Joseph's Arts And Science College Time : 7:30-9:00pm Day : Wednesdays 
 
These sessions are open to all women at the Beginner level of the sport! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your basics! Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun activity to add to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play! Sign up and join us ladies!! 
 
Contact: 
Vibha 
8073681373

name: 11-a-side Friendly Football Match
description:
11-a-side Friendly Football Match 
POLISH UP YOUR BOOTS Y’ALL!!! 
Match Details : • 28 participants • 11+3 subs per team • 30mins - 5mins half time - 40mins • Rolling substitutions 
Teams and Player Positions :  • After all 28 spots are filled up (men and women) we will try to divide the teams as fairly as possible based on experience and strength of players. 
• We will reach out to all those who have booked to know your preferred position (if you have any), and will try to form the team positions and formation based on that. 
• Team colours: we will let you know which colour you as your team are to carry. This includes Jersey, socks, shorts. 
Please note • We will have minimum one Man in the defence line, one in midfield and one in attack. ie Three men on field, in each team. And One male substitute. At all times. 
Please note that this is only for the girls bookings, all men's bookings will take place through a closed whatsapp group. 
DM Aishwarya (9738012622) for more details.  
Join us Sisters!! This is going to be a blast!

name: Footy with the Sisters - Intermediate - Ulsoor
description:
FOOTY WITH THE SISTERS - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS 
Bring out those football boots or shoes and remember to clean 'em nice! We're getting on the field to play the Beautiful game! 
This will be full 90mins session consisting of a warmup, technical ball drills, gametime and cool down. Since this is an intermediate level session, it is necessary that you have a bit of prior experience playing Football. Not recommended for complete beginners. 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) 
See you on the field Sisters!! 
 
Contact: Samara 
9902082782 
Vibha  
8073681373

name: B'Ball with the Sisters - Intermediate
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS - FRIDAY - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS: 
Bring out those kicks and get your bounce on, we're getting out on the court to play some BALL !! 
These sessions are open to all women at the intermediate level! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your existing basics! A bit of prior playing experience is required, not recommended for beginners. Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) See you on the field Sisters!! 
 
Contact: Aishwary 9738012622

name: Baddy with the Sisters - Saturday
description:
Bring out your Racquets ladies!! We're going to play some badminton! 
Details : Day - Saturday Location - PlayZone Indiranagar  
What do I do if I don't have a racquet and non-marking shoes?  Racquets and non-marking shoes are mandatory, but if you don't have them the court offers them for rent at the following costs. - Racquet - Rs.30 per hour - Non-marking shoes - Rs.30 per hour. 
We're super excited! Join us and we'll see you on the court. 
For any further queries, please feel free to reach out to us. 
 
Contact: 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: Run with the Sisters
description:
SIS Run Club @Cubbon park 
Meeting Point:  
We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 6:50am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
 
Read further for the details of the run! 
1. Distance : 3km & 5km 
2. Level : Open to all including beginners 
3. Reporting time : 6:45am 
4. Reporting point : We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 6:45am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
 5. Run venue : Cubbon park  
6. Things to carry : Water bottle and a few buckets of enthusiasm! 
7. Format : Warm-up, Run, Cool down. 
Please note that you will have an expert pacer guiding you through the entire session from start to finish!  
Let's get those running shoes on ladies!! Sign-up and join us now! 
 
Contact: 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: Yoga with Sisters in Sweat
description:
Join Yogini Sukriti for a fun, energising yoga class designed for everyone—whether you're a total newbie or a seasoned yogi! 
  
Step outside and roll out your mat for a yoga session surrounded by nature. Imagine practicing under the open sky, with fresh air filling your lungs and trees gently swaying around you. Breathe deeply, move freely, and let nature nurture you! 
  
Meeting Point: We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 8:45am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
  
What to carry: A yoga mat and a water bottle

name: Cricket with the Sisters - Gamenight
description:
Cricket with the Sisters is BACK, baby!  
Playing a sport and having fun doing it doesn't get any better. So what are you waiting for, Sister?  
Join us and sweat it out at this fun session of box cricket! 
Please note: 
- This session is open for women and men. 
- There's no need to bring any equipment, we'll provide everything 
- Come in a comfortable kit and training shoes 
Contact: Aishwary 9738012622

name: Ultimate Frisbee Session
description:
Ladiesss & Gents!  
We're bringing to you a fun, non contact sport in the form of Ultimate Frisbee! 
This session is for Misters as well! 
It's more than just about throwing a disc around, it's a great way to get your workout in and also return to a sport! 
This session is to introduce you to Ultimate Frisbee, and will consist of a warm up, basics of frisbee, some game time and a cool down.  
Time: 7:30 - 9:00 pm 
Venue: Rush Arena, Cooke Town 
Please wear comfortable sports attire with comfortable sports shoes . Carry a water bottle and towel!  
Get ready for Ultimate fun! See you on the field! 
Contact: Aishwary 9738012622
